creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: half moon shaped disk with eleven horn shaped pendants; disk has incised floral motifs with two aquatic-like creatures above and beside central flower; cloud motifs around the edges of the disk; metal chain wrapped around wither side of neck piece approximately 4" long; center of neck piece is plain; very similar to 2007.17.4
dimension: 17 1/8 x 12 1/2 x 3/4 in. (43.5 x 31.75 x 1.91 cm) (including horn shaped pendants)
title: Torque
